item.title: Saving Inkscape SVGs for Internet Use
item.description: SVGs are a great option for making simple, scalable graphics, logos, and animations. Inkscape is a free open source program for making SVGs. It’s great to draw cool stuff in Inkscape, but it’s a pain to get Inkscape SVGs to display properly on the web. We’ll show you how to clean up SVGs so when you save them so they obey CSS rules. Setting Your Document Properties Check in on your Document Properties by going to File > Document Properties.
